name: Beans on the Block: The Dream Comedy
name_original: Beans on the Block: The Dream Comedy
description:
Proceeds will be donated to Saint Jude's and Childs Play!

The animated series "Beans on the Block" meets Dante's Divine Comedy. Joshua has fallen asleep while doing his World Literature homework, Dante's Inferno. So his snarky, "know-it-all" classmate Cody must guide him through the ridiculous circles of the Inferno before Joshua can wake up.

Our Website

Wish to do a review of our game? Click the "do a review" that is in blue text or manually email jonathanshoemaker@takethisstudios.com

The Gluttony Challenge

The Dream Comedy is a ridiculously difficult game. Even the developers can still be challenged. It took our 3D Artist near 30 minutes worth of replays for the 3rd level. Would you suffer the same fate? Play the level of Gluttony and Tweet your time at us!
